By Salokin on Friday, September 1, 2006 - 12:31 pm:

can someone help me? I need to know what to do when you see the stone thing with a phenoix and a zan on it. i get past all the time until i reach the 6th floor and then i get masacered by i can't believe i'm going to say this a pixie!

By Sturnum94 on Friday, September 1, 2006 - 04:27 pm:

There isn't much to it. Basically, just combine your most powerful monsters, and then the next gen. and the next, etc. etc. Then, when you think that you are ready, just go. My first monster to reach the Promiass Ruins was a Durahan. It could easily beat all of my opponents. His stats were:

Lif. 250
Pow. 675
Int. 205
Ski. 590
Spd. 145
Def. 705

Although, it needed a little more lif. to get past the boss. Make sure you make a monster skilled in lif.

By Salokin on Friday, September 1, 2006 - 04:33 pm:

Thanks. I think I'll use that in the future.

Do yu have any advice about what I should help him in?
